title: Hearts Divided (Cedar Cove #0)
description: Storyline: Hearts Divided: 5-B Poppy Lane\The Apple Orchard\Liberty Hall (Cedar Cove #5.5) by Debbie Macomber , Katherine Stone , Lois Faye Dyer Three acclaimed authors team up for this collection of three brand-new contemporary romances about past and present love. Includes Macomber's "5-B Poppy Lane," Stone's "The Apple Orchard," and Dyer's "Liberty Hall." Original.
author: Debbie Macomber
